find_package(Eigen3 REQUIRED)
# Add as "system headers" to avoid warnings generated by them with
# compilers that support that notion.
include_directories(SYSTEM ${EIGEN3_INCLUDE_DIR})

find_package(Qt4 COMPONENTS QtCore REQUIRED)
include_directories(SYSTEM ${QT_INCLUDES})
add_definitions(${QT_DEFINITIONS})

# Headers for our public API
set(HEADERS
  basissetloader.h
)

# Source files for our data.
set(SOURCES
  basissetloader.cpp
  gamessukout.cpp
  gamessus.cpp
  gaussianfchk.cpp
  molden.cpp
  mopacaux.cpp
)

avogadro_add_library(AvogadroQuantumIO ${HEADERS} ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(AvogadroQuantumIO
  AvogadroQuantum
  ${QT_QTCORE_LIBRARY})
